metadata.title: CVE-2015-3874 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: The Sonivox components in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48T allow remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memorycorruption) via a crafted media file, aka internal bugs 23335715, 23307276,and 23286323.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
